name: DomainDelete
description: Executes when a domain is being deleted from the client account.

name: DomainEdit
description: Executes when the domain is being edited via the Client Profile Summary and Domains tabs in the Admin Area.

name: DomainTransferCompleted
description: Executes when a domain transfer is set to completed by the domain sync cron.

parameters.Notes: The unique identifier for the domain
The expiry date (if returned by the registrar)

name: DomainTransferFailed
description: Executes when a domain transfer is set to failed by the domain sync cron.

parameters.Notes: The unique identifier for the domain
The expiry date (if returned by the registrar)

name: DomainValidation
description: Executes as domain validation is being run

parameters.Notes: The sld of the domain. eg whmcs in whmcs.com
The tld of the domain. eg com in whmcs.com

name: PreDomainRegister
description: Executes before a domain register command

name: PreDomainTransfer
description: Executes before a domain transfer command

name: PreRegistrarRegisterDomain
description: Executes prior to the registrar function being executed for a domain. Allows the action to be aborted.

parameters.Notes: Array of common module parameters. See https://developers.whmcs.com/domain-registrars/module-parameters/

name: PreRegistrarRenewDomain
description: Executes prior to the registrar function being executed for a domain. Allows the action to be aborted.

parameters.Notes: Array of common module parameters. See https://developers.whmcs.com/domain-registrars/module-parameters/

name: PreRegistrarTransferDomain
description: Executes prior to the registrar function being executed for a domain. Allows the action to be aborted.

parameters.Notes: Array of common module parameters. See https://developers.whmcs.com/domain-registrars/module-parameters/

name: TopLevelDomainAdd
description: Executes when a new domain extension is added.

name: TopLevelDomainDelete
description: Executes when a domain extension is deleted.

name: TopLevelDomainPricingUpdate
description: Executes when domain extension pricing is updated.

name: TopLevelDomainUpdate
description: Executes when domain extensions configuration is updated.

parameters.Notes: An array of domain extensions that have been modified.
